author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Remove unnecessary includes from `RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecProducers/plugins/alpaka/HBHERecHitProducerPortable.cc`.

The file `HeterogeneousCore/CUDACore/interface/JobConfigurationGPURecord.h` is slated to be removed.

#### PR validation:

None, other than building the affected code.
title: Remove unnecessary includes from `HBHERecHitProducerPortable.cc`
